评论概述: Love this style so much I bought 6 of them!
评论详情: This cute dress is a dream to wear in this hot tropical climate. I wound up with 6: this hot pink; a dark blue Hawaiian print; solid light blue; light blue with pink and white floral; green vintage peach floral; and a navy with a sage, pink, and white botanical print.  Even though the style is the same, the different prints have totally different vibes. Pockets are a big bonus. They are fun to accessorize and go with bedazzled flip flops, simple sandals or ballet slippers.  I led several gatherings this year and wore these dresses most of the days and got many, many compliments.  They are a lightweight blend of rayon and cotton and if they get wet they pucker similar to seer sucker. I prefer my dresses smooth which takes just 2 minutes with a steamer.  The fabric is flowy and comfortable even on humid days and the long length can hide a multitude of issues - like bandages, scars, or knee braces.  I really like that I can be dressed up and ready for a dinner date just by stepping out of jeans and dropping one of these pretty dresses over my head. No fuss, all glam.  I spent way too many hours trying to decide which ONE I wanted. So I got my favorites and enjoyed looking pretty the rest of the summer. Will probably add a few next summer if they're still available.
Very cheap material.  Plus, big damage in the middle.

I bought several prints of this same dress in 2021 and have washed/worn them over and over again. They still look great and are so comfortable. They are a thin material so great for spring and summer. They were also a life saver for my second pregnancy. HOWEVER, when I bought them they were 24 dollars a piece and now they are 44 dollars a piece. Not worth the new price imo… it’s also listed as “25 off”… kinda disappointing that they went up so much.

#1. It was 103 degrees the day of the wedding. This dress felt perfect for me. Material, so soft to the skin, flowing ankle length, hidden pockets, sleeve length just about perfect for me. The color was soft green the print was not over done. It's a dress that would fit a young and slimmer frame as nicely as it felt on my 82+ year body. The bodice doesn't make it look like a maternity dress. Yet the straight fall from the bodice line could hide the curves you don't want showing. The ankle length allowed for some dressy sandles, a simple summer light gold straw purse. This dress can be dressed.up or semi dressy as mine looked. I really want to buy more of this style. Great for CA weather & heat.
